Posts.Content: henrycat wrote: I have Stage IV metastatic breast spreading to my brain, Lung and liver. I have completed 10 brain radiation. I am now taking 4 21 day cycle of chemo. I will be done in May. It is crazy how your life can change overnight. I am trying to take one day at a time. I would love to hear from other members about how they are doing. Maryclare Plunkett Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed iwith Stage IV metastatic breast cancer henrycat Nan812
